product_name: Louis Garneau Sport Metz Bike Jersey - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A boon on hot rides, the men's lightweight Louis Garneau Sport Metz Bike Jersey is made of Pro Cool fabric for enhanced airflow and has specialty pockets, including one just for used gel packets.
short_description: A boon on hot rides, the men's lightweight Louis Garneau Sport Metz Bike Jersey is made of Pro Cool fabric for enhanced airflow and has specialty pockets, including one just for used gel packets.
